Uses of Interface
net.sf.mmm.search.engine.api.SearchEngine

  • Packages that use SearchEngine 
    Package Description
    net.sf.mmm.search.engine.api
    Provides the API of the search-engine.
    net.sf.mmm.search.engine.base
    Contains the base-implementation of search-engine.
    net.sf.mmm.search.engine.impl.lucene
    Contains the implementation of search-engine using apache lucene.
    net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.api
    Provides the API of the Search-Indexer.
    net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.impl.lucene
    Contains the implementation of the Search-Indexer API using apache lucene.

    • Uses of SearchEngine in net.sf.mmm.search.engine.api

      Subinterfaces of SearchEngine in net.sf.mmm.search.engine.api 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ManagedSearchEngine
      This is the interface for a managed SearchEngine.

    • Uses of SearchEngine in net.sf.mmm.search.engine.base

      Classes in net.sf.mmm.search.engine.base that implement SearchEngine 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractSearchEngine
      This is the abstract base implementation of the ManagedSearchEngine interface.

    • Uses of SearchEngine in net.sf.mmm.search.engine.impl.lucene

      Classes in net.sf.mmm.search.engine.impl.lucene that implement SearchEngine 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LuceneSearchEngine
      This is the implementation of the SearchEngine interface using lucene as underlying search-engine.

    • Uses of SearchEngine in net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.api

      Methods in net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.api that return SearchEngine 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SearchEngine SearchIndexer.getSearchEngine()
      This method gets the SearchEngine for the index of this SearchIndexer.

    • Uses of SearchEngine in net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.impl.lucene

      Methods in net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.impl.lucene that return SearchEngine 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SearchEngine LuceneSearchIndexer.getSearchEngine()
      This method gets the SearchEngine for the index of this SearchIndexer.
